trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Lingleville
There were 2 other sightings in Lingleville on or around October 13th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my office. I thought headlights were coming around the bend in our road, but they never passed by. I looked out the bathroom window to see if my neighbor had parked his car in the field, and I saw a white light leave the field and head to the north. The object quickly left at horizon level until it blinked out.
